metadata.title: CVE-2021-28156 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
HashiCorp Consul Enterprise version 1.8.0 up to 1.9.4 audit log can bebypassed by specifically crafted HTTP events. Fixed in 1.9.5, and 1.8.10.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
